ul.li: Select a target. Reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn

card.name: Backlash
card.text: You may use Regent's 'Control' power twice this turn

card.name: Gut-Zap
card.text: Regent deals 1 target 2 psychic damage. The target dealt damage in this way cannot deal damage until the start of your next turn

card.name: Seize
card.text: Destroy a target with 4 or less HP. If you do, Regent may deal a target 3 projectile damage

card.name: Zap
card.text: Regent deals 1 target 4 psychic damage. Destroy up to 2 ongoing cards

card.name: Drop That
card.text: Regent deals 1 target 2 psychic damage. Reveal the top card of the villain deck. You may choose to discard that card or return it to the top of the villain deck

card.name: A Life Of Leisure
card.text: Draw 5 cards. Immediately end your turn

card.name: Scepter-Taser
card.text: After Regent uses his 'Control' power on a target, Regent deals that target 1 lightning damage

card.name: Crown
card.text: Reduce melee and projectile damage dealt to Regent by 1

card.name: Growing Control
card.text: After Regent uses his 'Control' power on a target, place a token next to that target. Increase the damage Regent deals with his 'Control' power by 1 when the target has a token next to them. When this card is destroyed, remove all tokens that have been placed in this way

card.name: My Little Army
card.text: Whenever Regent destroys a target, other than a character card, you may put it under this card. At the start of Regent's turn, this card deals X projectile damage to a target, where X = the number of cards under this card

card.name: Reactive Zap
card.text: Play this card next to a non-hero target. Once a turn, when that target would deal damage, Regent may use a power

card.name: Over Here
card.text: Whenever a hero target would be dealt damage by a villain card, you may redirect that damage to another hero target

card.name: Mine
card.text: Play this card next to a non-hero target other than a character card. Whenever that target deals damage, you may redirect that damage to another target. You may prevent any effects caused by the target next to this card
